title: HSBC, Barclays, NatWest join Prince of Wales' net zero banking task force
lead: Executives from likes of Bank of America, BNP Paribas, Macquarie, Lloyds, and Citi also join effort to develop credible pathway to deliver a net zero banking sector ...

title: HSBC hires PwC climate change lead Celine Herweijer as group chief sustainability officer
lead: Herweijer will be tasked with leading the bank's push towards net zero ...

title: Square-bottomed Easter eggs spearhead Aldi's latest anti-plastics drive
lead: Supermarket announces latest step in its drive to ensure all product packaging is reusable, recyclable or compostable by the end of 2025 ...

title: Investment management 'not fit for purpose' in delivering sustainable wealth creation

lead: Latest calls come as government launches subsidised training for green retrofit installations and latest data confirms on-going administrative challenges ...

title: Heathrow debuts 'blueprint' for zero carbon domestic flights

title: LowCVP becomes Zemo as race to electrify road transport gathers pace

title: BP and Chevron back geothermal pioneer Eavor Technologies in $40m funding round

title: Big Blue embraces big green: IBM pledges to reach net zero emissions by 2030
lead: US computing giant announces ambitious headline goal alongside a series of interim environmental targets for 2025 ...

title: Study: Insurance firms deliver 'significant improvements' to climate-related disclosures through 2020

title: National Infrastructure Commission asks 'where are the decarbonisation delivery plans'?

title: Transition Pathway Initiative: Just 14 per cent of heavy industry is aligned with global climate goals
lead: But researchers predict that a 'tipping point' of technically viable, economically attractive solutions to decarbonise industrial and materials sectors is approaching ...

title: No smiley face for climate campaigners after wind turbine emoji bid is refused

title: 'The EV revolution is underway': Number of EVs on roads operated by EV100 firms doubled in 2020

title: Glencore to hold shareholder vote on 2050 net zero plan

title: Green ambulance? NHS plots hydrogen-fuelled prototype for London

title: 'Educate, inspire, and involve': Could citizens' climate juries help fix the Green Homes Grant scheme - and a lot more besides?
lead: Residents of Tees Valley and County Durham back improved climate and nature education, ring-fenced carbon taxes, ‘green bonds’ and higher spending to hit net zero in first of four citizens' climate panels convened by IPPR ...

title: Net Zero Asset Owner Alliance: Blended finance needed to drive climate investment

title: The Hy Life: UK's first hydrogen-fuelled show homes to open Gateshead

title: Coventry Council touts plans for battery 'gigafactory' at local airport site

title: 'Huge step for British car manufacturing': Jaguar targets fully electric vehicle range by 2025

title: 'Bonkers savings': NatWest and Octopus Energy debut discounted EV charging package

title: BNP Paribas strengthens policy on beef and soy-driven deforestation in Brazil

title: Shareholder advisor ISS embeds climate risk into global voting guidelines

title: Renewables overtake fossil fuels in 2020 as Britain's power grid enjoys 'greenest year' yet

title: ScotWind auction scheme delayed after Crown Estate UK hits jackpot in England and Wales auction

title: Mars, Cargill put nature regeneration goals alongside avoiding climate catastrophe
